abstract: Proposed free trade agreement with South Korea would open the American textile market to a manufacturing powerhouse; both political parties are eager to show efforts to revive ailing economy, believing trade deals will reduce costs for American consumers and increase foreign purchases of American goods and services.
snippet: A proposed free trade agreement with South Korea would open the American market to a manufacturing powerhouse that has its own high-technology textile industry.
lead_paragraph: A proposed free trade agreement with South Korea would open the American market to a manufacturing powerhouse that has its own high-technology textile industry.

headline.main: Textile Makers Fight to Be Heard on South Korea Trade Pact
headline.print_headline: Textile Makers Struggle to Be Heard on South Korea Free Trade Pact
headline.seo: Foes of South Korea Free Trade Deal Struggle to Be Heard
